Oral contraceptives is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* OCP
* Oral contraceptives
* OralContraceptiveStatus

#### Uses

Oral contraceptives is used by the model in the following places

* [Ever used oral contraceptives](/model/OralContraceptiveEver)
* [Time since taking OCP per year](/model/OralContraceptiveSinceStop)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> What is your history with oral contraceptives?

The user has the following answer options

* Former user
* Current user
* Never used
Oral contraceptives are also called birth control pills and are used to preven pregnancies.


### Optimizability

Optimizability is a subjective measure that we have made to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Oral contraceptives is 30. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change now, but it has once definitely been in your control*
